Using → Using

AKRR Usage

It can be most useful to understand how AKRR generate batch scripts which are later submitted for execution on HPC resource. This will help with understanding how configuration works.

First you need to add HPC resource to AKRR, then Application Kernel should be installed on that resource. After these two steps the appkernels periodic execution can be set.

Next: Add HPC resource
